interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: Cherry
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
Review Text: nice set of spray bottles!! I used it to mix/dilute bleach and other chemical products that needed to be in new, unrecycled bottles. sprayer works fine, although one of them did leak when i turned the bottle upside down. not sure if that would happen with all the bottles, or just this one sprayer that i received. if you have other "plastic" spray bottles around your house, it will be easy to forget that this one is GLASS, so just be careful.
Review Title: nice set of glass bottles!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality, value-oriented products across personal grooming categories, with a notable focus on hair care and skincare. Their interest in modern wigs with natural textures underscores a blend of aesthetics and practicality, favoring synthetic options for both daily use and special occasions while being budget-conscious.

Recently, the user has further embraced skincare, highlighting a holistic approach to personal grooming. Their purchase of targeted skincare products reveals a commitment to effective self-care and the integration of quality routines. 

The user's acquisition of refillable spray bottles exemplifies their dedication to practicality and sustainability, alongside an expanding interest in versatile household items and DIY solutions, including essential oils and cleaning products. This recent interaction reflects their ongoing pursuit of quality and convenience in both personal care and home management.

In their latest review, the user expressed satisfaction with their new glass spray bottles, particularly valuing their utility for various purposes. However, they noted a minor issue with one of the sprayers leaking, indicating a preference for thorough product evaluation and performance reliability. Overall, the user's behavior illustrates a steadfast commitment to quality, sustainability, and comprehensive solutions in their personal and household needs.
